text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide smart.who.int.dak-empty

Profile: SMARTImplementationGuide

DAKEmpty

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://smart.who.int/dak-empty/ImplementationGuide/smart.who.int.dak-empty

An empty Digital Adaptation Kit (DAK) Implementation Guide to be used as a starting point for publishing SMART DAK content

name: DAKEmpty
title: SMART DAK Empty
description: An empty Digital Adaptation Kit (DAK) Implementation Guide to be used as a starting point for publishing SMART DAK content

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: A birth defects surveillance mobile application should be able to function as a standalone (for training purposes, small-scale surveillance or other uses) and/or contribute data to a centralized database, depending on local protocols
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – general
A birth defects surveillance mobile application should be able to function as a standalone (for training purposes, small-scale surveillance or other uses) and/or contribute data to a centralized database, depending on local protocols

resource.description:

resource.name: LM.BDS.NFXNREQ.1
resource.description: Provide password-protected access for authorized users

resource.description: Notify user to change password the first time they log in

resource.description: Adhere to complex password requirements

resource.description: Provide mechanism to securely change a user's password

resource.description: Notify user of password change to their account

resource.description: Reset user's password in a secure manner

resource.description: Lock out user after a specified number of wrong password attempts

resource.description: Log system logins and logouts

resource.description: Record all authentication violations

resource.description: Provide a means to ensure confidentiality and privacy of personal health information

resource.name: LM.BDS.NFXNREQ.77
resource.description:
Solution should use international coding standards for data whenever possible
Countries can develop their own local coding system, but WHO recommends use of ICD-10 coding system to classify congenital anomalies for international reporting and comparisons

resource.name: The birth defects surveillance system to automatically make the reports I submit available in the system's data portal, if one exists
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >The birth defects surveillance system to automatically make the reports I submit available in the system's data portal, if one exists so that >I do not need to send the reports each time I generate them

resource.name: The birth defects surveillance system to automatically send the reports I submit, by email, to a preconfigured distribution list
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >The birth defects surveillance system to automatically send the reports I submit, by email, to a preconfigured distribution list so that >I do not need to send the reports each time I generate them

resource.name: The birth defects surveillance system to notify the birth defects specialist that a case needs to be reviewed using an application notification, email, SMS or other method
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >The birth defects surveillance system to notify the birth defects specialist that a case needs to be reviewed using an application notification, email, SMS or other method so that >The birth defects specialist is informed in a timely manner about cases pending their review

resource.name: The birth defects surveillance system to notify the surveillance data manager that the case has been updated with the missing information, using an application notification, email, SMS or other method
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The birth defects surveillance system to notify the surveillance data manager that the case has been updated with the missing information, using an application notification, email, SMS or other method so that >The surveillance data manager is informed in a timely manner

resource.name: The birth defects surveillance system to notify the surveillance programme manager when a report is marked as ready for their review, using an application notification, email, SMS or other method
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >The birth defects surveillance system to notify the surveillance programme manager when a report is marked as ready for their review, using an application notification, email, SMS or other method so that >The surveillance programme manager is informed in a timely manner about report(s) pending their review

resource.name: The search to match on partial information (e.g. partial birth dates)
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The search to match on partial information (e.g. partial birth dates) so that >I have a better chance of finding a match

resource.name: The system should be able to integrate with other approved systems, such as electronic medical records and public health databases, to allow for seamless data sharing and analysis
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – interoperability
The system should be able to integrate with other approved systems, such as electronic medical records and public health databases, to allow for seamless data sharing and analysis

resource.name: The system to allow search parameters configuration (e.g. mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable)
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to allow search parameters configuration (e.g. mandatory fields, when partial information is acceptable) so that >A search can be optimized without compromising confidentiality

resource.name: The system to automatically calculate indicators based on preset rules
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >The system to automatically calculate indicators based on preset rules so that >I do not have to calculate this myself

resource.name: The system to delete images and videos automatically from the device, once uploaded into the birth defects surveillance system, if required by  local protocols
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to delete images and videos automatically from the device, once uploaded into the birth defects surveillance system, if required by local protocols so that >I can ensure private data do not remain on my device

resource.name: The system to display sufficient data to identify the case
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to display sufficient data to identify the case so that >I can check whether this is a new or existing case record and avoid duplicates

resource.name: The system to require me (a user) to search to see whether the case record is already in the system before starting a new entry
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to require me (a user) to search to see whether the case record is already in the system before starting a new entry so that >I can avoid duplicates

resource.name: The system to retain history of updated information on the case record (e.g. observation notes)
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to retain history of updated information on the case record (e.g. observation notes) so that >I can review past information updates

resource.name: The system to return all potential matches based on search criteria
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to return all potential matches based on search criteria so that >I can find the best match

resource.name: The system to support me with visually identifying a birth defect by providing information about possible defects and syndromes (including photos, descriptions and ICD codes based on the WHO QRH) when I indicate on the screen an anatomical region of the newborn
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >The system to support me with visually identifying a birth defect by providing information about possible defects and syndromes (including photos, descriptions and ICD codes based on the WHO QRH) when I indicate on the screen an anatomical region of the newborn so that >I can better compare and identify the anomaly or syndrome

resource.name: The system to support with the necessary information related to case inclusion criteria, if it is stored in the system
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >The system to support with the necessary information related to case inclusion criteria, if it is stored in the system so that >I can review birth defects against case inclusion criteria

resource.name: To approve the generated report using a digital signature or other method appropriate for the local context
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >To approve the generated report using a digital signature or other method appropriate for the local context so that >I can certify the report as official

resource.name: To be able to attach an identifier (e.g. QR code, barcode, fingerprint, photo) to the newborn's or mother's record based on national standards consent
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To be able to attach an identifier (e.g. QR code, barcode, fingerprint, photo) to the newborn's or mother's record based on national standards consent so that >I have additional ways of identifying the newborn and/or mother

resource.name: To be able to collect digital signatures from clients, if acceptable according to the local protocols
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To be able to collect digital signatures from clients, if acceptable according to the local protocols so that >I can ensure client's informed consent for data collection is easy to get and register in the birth defects surveillance system

resource.name: To be able to configure report parameters when generating reports such as time range, geography and other details
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To be able to configure report parameters when generating reports such as time range, geography and other details so that >Appropriate reports can be generated

resource.name: To be able to flag issues with a case and send that case to the data collector
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To be able to flag issues with a case and send that case to the data collector so that >The data collector can review, follow up and correct the case record when further information is available

resource.name: To be able to flag issues with a case and send that case to the surveillance data manager for review and follow up
resource.description: I want Birth defect specialist, I want: >To be able to flag issues with a case and send that case to the surveillance data manager for review and follow up so that >The surveillance data manager can add more information to the case record and send it to the data collector

resource.name: to be able to retrieve client information (e.g. newborn, mother, father) from existing electronic medical records and link it to the case record
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >to be able to retrieve client information (e.g. newborn, mother, father) from existing electronic medical records and link it to the case record so that >I can reuse existing data and avoid collecting the same data multiple times from the client

resource.name: To be able to send the final determination regarding the diagnosis back to the care provider using an application notification, email, SMS or other method, if required by the local protocol
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To be able to send the final determination regarding the diagnosis back to the care provider using an application notification, email, SMS or other method, if required by the local protocol so that >The care provider has a final verified diagnosis to provide better care to newborn

resource.name: To be able to update demographic information of newborn/mother/informant
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To be able to update demographic information of newborn/mother/informant so that >The most current information can be recorded

resource.name: To bypass the standard flow as needed and jump between sections, except when local protocols demand consent to proceed
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To bypass the standard flow as needed and jump between sections, except when local protocols demand consent to proceed so that >The data can be entered in a nonlinear fashion as needed

resource.name: To create a new case record with a unique ID and timestamp of record creation
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To create a new case record with a unique ID and timestamp of record creation so that >I can begin entering birth defects case information

resource.name: To have the ability to aggregate the data by time period and surveillance population
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To have the ability to aggregate the data by time period and surveillance population so that >I can check the data for quality issues

resource.name: To have the ability to deidentify the data and prepare the database for analysis and reporting
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To have the ability to deidentify the data and prepare the database for analysis and reporting so that >Sensitive personal information is not included in birth defects surveillance reports or any results from the analysis

resource.name: To have the ability to make changes to the data (case records)
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To have the ability to make changes to the data (case records) so that >I can correct issues that I have detected

resource.name: To have the ability to query the data to look for issues of data quality
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To have the ability to query the data to look for issues of data quality so that >I can detect problems with the data

resource.name: To have the ability to see a summary of all birth defects cases captured in the health facilities participating in the surveillance system
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >To have the ability to see a summary of all birth defects cases captured in the health facilities participating in the surveillance system so that >I can make better decisions related to birth defect prevention for a given administrative area/region/country

resource.name: To have the ability to upload images and videos of the birth defect in the birth defects surveillance application or system
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To have the ability to upload images and videos of the birth defect in the birth defects surveillance application or system so that >I can share them with specialists and validate if a case shall be recorded

resource.name: To have the possibility to download the data to my own programme data centre
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >To have the possibility to download the data to my own programme data centre so that >I have a local copy of the data for anlysis and merge with other years/cohorts of data

resource.name: To have the possibility to see or visualize medical data and previous measurements (log history)
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To have the possibility to see or visualize medical data and previous measurements (log history) so that >I can better monitor the case

resource.name: To produce reports based on stored templates
resource.description: I want Surveillance data manager, I want: >To produce reports based on stored templates so that >I do not need to create the reports manually for reporting purposes

resource.name: To search with wildcards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters)
resource.description: I want Data collector, I want: >To search with wildcards (using a symbol to replace one or more characters) so that >I can find something without knowing the exact spelling

resource.name: To view a range of standardized visualizations (e.g. charts, tables, maps)
resource.description: I want Surveillance programme manager, I want: >To view a range of standardized visualizations (e.g. charts, tables, maps) so that >I am able to use data, collected in the health facilities participating in the surveillance system, for service delivery and informing programmatic actions with the aim of improving the quality of care for clients

resource.name: Use industry standard user interface practices and apply them consistently throughout the system
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – usability
Use industry standard user interface practices and apply them consistently throughout the system

resource.name: Warn user if no valid backup for more than a predefined number of days
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – reliability
Warn user if no valid backup for more than a predefined number of days

resource.name: Work in environments subject to loss of connectivity
resource.description:
*Category*: System requirements – reliability
Work in environments subject to loss of connectivity
